events.text:
20XX
It's been 10 years after the 17th Battle Snake Tournament concluded and it's organizer, the Carrot Group, disappeared under unknown circumstances.
The legendary sport of Battle Snake became nothing more than a footnote in history, [pause=0.5] mostly forgotten by the general public, [pause=0.5] until the Carrot Group leaders suddenly reappeared and once again opened their doors to young competitors wishing to prove themselves.
